These are the identified "Property Name" entities in the paragraph. These entities refer to the properties or characteristics of different objects or concepts in the text.

3. "LUMO levels"

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The energy loss from the low output voltage of the photovoltaic devices ( 0.38 - 0.4 V ) can be attributed to the relatively large difference between the LUMO levels of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM ( i.e.

Let's think step by step.

1. "low output voltage of the photovoltaic devices (0.38 - 0.4 V)" - Here, the "output voltage" of the photovoltaic devices can be considered as a "Property Value" entity. The specific voltage range (0.38 - 0.4 V) provides more information about the output voltage and can also be considered as a "Property Value" entity.
2. "the relatively large difference between the LUMO levels of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM" - In this phrase, the "difference" between the LUMO levels of the compounds PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM can be identified as a "Property Value" entity.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

* "low output voltage" and "0.38 - 0.4 V" (related to output voltage)
* "the relatively large difference" (related to the difference between LUMO levels)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, I will remove the irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to the Value of Material Property:

* "0.38 - 0.4 V" (related to the output voltage of the photovoltaic devices)
* "the relatively large difference" (related to the difference between the LUMO levels of the compounds PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM)

These entities provide information about the material properties of the photovoltaic devices and the compounds PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Here are the valid entities presented as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 0.38 - 0.4 V |
| the relatively large difference |

These entities provide information about the material properties of the photovoltaic devices and the compounds PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM. The first entity, "0.38 - 0.4 V", is the range of low output voltage for the photovoltaic devices. The second entity, "the relatively large difference", refers to the difference between the LUMO levels of the compounds PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM.
